short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips parts of a youtube video automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of skipping boring parts of your favorite youtube video? Well you can use this extension to automatically do exactly that for you.
How to use?
- Press "Alt + Shift + s" to toggle the UI visibility on youtube.com.
- Type from timestamp and to timestamp in the inputs in the format (hh:mm:ss or mm:ss or ss).
- Click on Add.
- The extension will automatically the content between your set timestamps whenever you play that video.
